TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CustomJsonConverters extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides access to custom JsonConverter instances used by the Azure Search .NET SDK. For test purposes only.
Docs.remarks: This class is part of the internal implementation of the Azure Cognitive Search .NET SDK. It is not intended to be used directly by application code.

static member CreateAllConverters : unit -> seq<Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConverter>

Docs.summary: Creates a collection of all custom converters.
Docs.returns: An enumerable sequence of JSON converters.

Docs.summary: Creates a new converter that converts between dates serialized in ISO 8601 format in JSON strings and System.DateTime instances.
